items.title: Early Pregnancy Dating
items.description:
Purpose: Accurate gestational-age estimation in early pregnancy
Age range: Gestational weeks 8 to 14

items.title: Fetal Size in Early Pregnancy
items.description:
Purpose: Assess early pregnancy fetal size (crown-rump length)
Age range: Gestational weeks 8 to 14

items.title: Symphysis-Fundal Height
items.description: Purpose: Assess symphysis-fundal height Age range: Gestational week 15 until term

items.title: Fetal Growth
items.description: Purpose: Assess fetal anthropometric growth measurementsAge range: Gestational week 14 until term

files.title: Excel-based Fetal Biometry and Estimated Fetal Weight Calculator
Equations for parameters and computation of Z-scores and centiles for EFW according to GA

items.title: Fetal Doppler
items.description:
Purpose: Provide gestational age-specific normative centiles for umbilical artery Doppler indices
Age range: Gestational week 24 until term

items.title: Gestational Weight Gain
items.description:
Purpose: Assess maternal weight gain during pregnancy
Age range: gestational week 15 until term

items.title: Newborn Size for Very Preterm Infants
items.description:
Purpose: Assess size at birth (within 24 hours) for very preterm newborns
Age range: At birth, born between gestational weeks 24 and 33

items.title: Newborn Size
items.description: Purpose: Assess size at birth (within 24 hours) for newbornsAge range: At birth, born between gestational weeks 33 and 43

files.title: Excel-based calculator for weight/length ratio at birth

items.title: INTER-NDA
items.description:
Purpose: Neurodevelopment assessment
Age range: 22 to 30 months

items.title: Postnatal Growth of Preterm Infants
items.description:
Purpose: Assess the postnatal growth of preterm infants (born between gestational weeks 26 and 37)
Age range: From birth until 64 weeks postmenstrual age
